item.title: Learning Vaadin7 Review
item.description: Some time ago I was proposed to review the second edition of the “Learning Vaadin 7” (On Amazon) book. Shame on me for holding it for so long. Previously I have used Vaadin 6 and was really impressed by its features and simplicity of doing real desktop-like web-applications. But at the same time every now and then I was frustrated by some of the methods and mostly by the methods returning plain Objects.
